history.proof: intros x. unfold Cmod, Rmax, Rabs. destruct x as [x1 x2]. strivial use: sqrt_plus_sqr unfold: Rmax, snd, fst, Rabs inv: sumbool.

ctx: apply Rle_trans with (r2 := sqrt (Rmax (Rabs x1) (Rabs x2))).
